testcase.name: VIR-257.01 Verify that the dropdown is shown with indexed matches, when shopper enter a keyword into the search field
VIR-257.02 Verify that the shopper can move though the indexed matches by using Arrow keys on the keyboard
VIR-257.03 Verify that the shopper can select the term by pressing Enter key on the keyboard
VIR-257.04 Verify that the indexed matches are shown in the dropdown
VIR-257.05 Verify that the Product Details page is shown when select the term
VIR-257.06 Verify that the search is performed within the item's name
